info.name: RealmEye Night Mode
info.description: A darker revamp of the RealmEye website's UI
info.additionalInfo:
v0.8
Redid tooltips in darker coloring, did the forum in the theme as well (despite finding out half way through that the forum does have its own dark theme. This may possibly be rolled back depending on feedback)

v0.2
Tweaked .item-wrapper to hide gap displaying bright colors. UI should appear more consistent across different browsers now.
